Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods

Class Artemis

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.GodStrategy
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gods.Artemis
public class Artemis
extends GodStrategy
This class implements the Artemis strategy used by the Player who chose the powers of this God. Specifically, Artemis allows the Worker to move one additional time using MultipleMovementDelegate, but not back to its initial position, which is saved using PreviousCellNeededDelegate.

  • Field Summary

    (package private) int ARTEMIS_MAX_MOVE_NUM

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean canBuild​(Board board, Worker worker)
    This method calls superclass canBuild method, if it returns false, the MultipleMovementDelegate canMove method is called, to determine if the Player has lost or if it can still perform another move.
    boolean checkMove​(Worker worker, Cell moveCell)
    Implements movements check by delegating to MultipleMovementDelegate and checking that moveCell is not equal to the original Worker position (in this turn).
    void endPlayerTurn​(Player player)
    This method calls superclass endTurn method, then resets movement count and previous cell at the end of Player's turn.
    void executeMove​(Worker worker, Cell moveCell)
    This method first saves the previous position using PreviousCellNeededDelegate in order to check that the Worker doesn't move an additional time to its initial position, then it executes standard move, finally movement count of MultipleMovementDelegate is increased.

  • Method Details

    • checkMove

      public boolean checkMove​(Worker worker, Cell moveCell)
      Implements movements check by delegating to MultipleMovementDelegate and checking that moveCell is not equal to the original Worker position (in this turn).
      Overrides:
      checkMove in class GodStrategy
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker that the Player wants to move.
      moveCell - the cell in which the Player want to move the worker.
      Returns:
      true if the Move passed as parameter can be performed, false otherwise.
      See Also:
      MultipleMovementDelegate.checkMove(Worker, Cell, Worker)

    • executeMove

      public void executeMove​(Worker worker, Cell moveCell)
      This method first saves the previous position using PreviousCellNeededDelegate in order to check that the Worker doesn't move an additional time to its initial position, then it executes standard move, finally movement count of MultipleMovementDelegate is increased.
      Overrides:
      executeMove in class GodStrategy
      Parameters:
      worker - the worker that the Player wants to move.
      moveCell - the cell in which the Player want to move the worker.
      See Also:
      GodStrategy.executeMove(Worker, Cell)

    • endPlayerTurn

      public void endPlayerTurn​(Player player)
      This method calls superclass endTurn method, then resets movement count and previous cell at the end of Player's turn.
      Overrides:
      endPlayerTurn in class GodStrategy
      Parameters:
      player - Player corresponding to the current turn.
      See Also:
      GodStrategy.endPlayerTurn(Player)

    • canBuild

      public boolean canBuild​(Board board, Worker worker)
      This method calls superclass canBuild method, if it returns false, the MultipleMovementDelegate canMove method is called, to determine if the Player has lost or if it can still perform another move.
      Overrides:
      canBuild in class GodStrategy
      Parameters:
      board - the Match board to consider
      worker - the worker whose ability to build is about to be tested
      Returns:
      true if the Worker passed can build, or if it can move again (and maybe build from the new position), false otherwise.
      See Also:
      GodStrategy.canBuild(Board, Worker)
